text: The 2019–20 season was Al-Adalah's first ever season in the Pro League, the top flight of Saudi Arabian football, and their 36th season in existence. The club participated in the Pro League and the King Cup. The season covered the period from 1 July 2019 to 9 September 2020. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers and loans== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
